name: Rapscallion
description:
You are
in deep crap, 
my friend.

Midterm grades 
go out tomorrow,

and it’s pretty
likely that
you failed… 

ALL of your tests.

...

...but maybe
there’s still
time to
change that.

All the grades
need to be
finalized on
The Principal’s
computer…

...and no
one is at
the school
right now
in the
middle of
the night,
probably.  

...

There’s hope.

This game is free! However, if you would like to support us and maybe pay for us to get lunch, we would appreciate it greatly. <3

This game was made by four wonderful individuals for the 48 Hour Sarasota Game Jam over Labor Day Weekend. 

Luis CorreaArtistKK HongAnimatorAlyssa ConcannonMusic/Sound & WriterKelsey WatkinsProgrammer
